sources.title: Ghost Town (1936) HARRY CAREY
sources.description:
Stars: Harry Carey, David Sharpe, Ruth Findlay
Director: Harry L. Fraser

When an old miner is ambushed by outlaws, a passing cowboy comes to his aid but winds up getting blamed for the attack.

Movie Class by PizzaFLIX: Harry Carey (1878â€“1947) began acting in 1910 to become one of Silent Film's earliest superstars and successfully transitioned into "talkies." He made 260 films and is best remembered as a cowboy. So much so, John Ford and John Wayne closed their iconic western THE SEARCHERS (1956) with a visual homage to Harry Carey.

sources.title: Ghost Town (1936) Western Full Length Movie
sources.description:
An old miner is ambushed by outlaws trying to steal the $10,000 he is carrying to start up a new mine. A passing cowboy comes to the miner's aid, but winds up getting blamed for the attack.

Writer & Director: Harry L. Fraser
Stars: Harry Carey, David Sharpe, Ruth Findlay 
Genres: Western

sources.title: Ghost Town
sources.description: Title: Ghost Town Summary: An old miner is ambushed by outlaws trying to steal the $10,000 he is carrying to start up a new mine. A passing cowboy comes to the miner's aid, but winds up getting blamed for the attack. Directed by: Harry L. Fraser Actors: Production Company: William Berke Productions Inc. Release Date: 15 February 1936 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Color: Black and White Morrell and his henchmen are after the money miner McCall is returning with. They set a trap but Cheyenne Harry breaks it up. When the Sheriff finds Cheyenne with the money he is jailed. Morrell learns the money is at the Sheriff's house and grabs and flees. But Cheyenne has broken out of jail and gives chase.

metadata.Plot: Morrell and his henchmen are after the money miner McCall is returning with. They set a trap but Cheyenne Harry breaks it up. When the Sheriff finds Cheyenne with the money he is jailed. Morrell learns the money is at the Sheriff's house and grabs and flees. But Cheyenne has broken out of jail and gives chase.
metadata.Actors: Harry Carey, David Sharpe, Ruth Findlay
